reviews.review_msg: Prof was good overall in terms of lectures and giving rubrics for assignments, but were so condense in detail. Super hard grader with APA 7 citations and spelling/errors and seems to have specific things shes looking for in discussions. INDG classes are usually open-minded in terms of learning, but this one leans towards strict western learning.

Her class content is well informed and enjoyable but I recommend auditing her course, she is a very tough grader and very focused on citations and formatting. I understand sticking to assignment deadlines and late penalties are a part of academia but I also believe that academia wasn't built in a way that works for everyone.
